name: Addon Control Panel
description:
[COLOR="DarkOrange"][COLOR="Sienna"][B]Stop logging out of the game just to change your addons![/B][/COLOR][/COLOR]

ACP adds the "Addons" button to the game's main menu (The one you get when you hit ESC). It allows you to manage your addons in game, with an interface which looks similar to the blizzard addon manager. ACP will help you deal with the "Clutter" that multi-part addons and libraries introduce by displaying your addons in logical arrangements. ACP has many features to make your addon list easy to manage, help you with missing libraries, and provide you with detailed information about each addon.
[COLOR="DarkOrange"]
[COLOR="Sienna"][B]Icon meaning:[/B][/COLOR][/COLOR]

Star: Protected addon - this addon will not be disabled when you choose disable all, also if it is not enabled when you log into the game, it will be re-enabled and you will be prompted to reload the ui.

Dk Grey Open Lock: Addon does not supply compatibility information

Lt Grey Closed Lock: Addon has provided compatibility information

Addon compatibility helps you determine if the addon supports the current version of the game that you are running. You will see further information in the tooltip for the addon, and incompatible/out of date addons will be labeled in the main addon list.
[COLOR="DarkOrange"]
[COLOR="Sienna"][B]Credits:[/B][/COLOR][/COLOR]

ACP is based on the work of 2 other projects rMCP, which is a version of MCP modified by Rophy, and MCP originally by Saien.

name: AdvancedInterfaceOptions
description:
Restores access to removed interface options in Legion and ads a CVar browser for settings galore.

We are currently covering simple options for the following:

General:

* Player Titles
* Guild Names
* Guild Titles
* Stop Auto Attack
* Attack on Assist
* Cast action keybinds on key down
* Fade Map when Moving
* Secure Ability Toggle
* Display Lua Errors
* No Debuff Filter on Target
* Reverse Cleanup Bags
* Quest sorting mode (top vs proximity)
* Select Action Cam mode

Chat:

* Remove Chat Hover Delay
* Enable Mouse Wheel Scrolling

Floating Combat Text:

* Float mode (up/down/arc)
* Energy Gains
* Auras
* Honor Gains
* Reputation
* Combo Points
* Combat State (Entering/Leaving Combat)
* Spell Mechanics
* Healing
* Absorb (Self and Target)
* Directional Scale (brings back the classic, only upwards moving text)
* Low HP/Mana

And many more via the built in CVar browser, including stuff that has never ever been exposed as an UI option by Blizzard like the violence level or the new setting that changes the distance nameplates are visible at!

Type /aio in chat or go to the Interface Options and look for AdvancedInterfaceOptions

name: Bagnon
description:
[URL="https://www.patreon.com/user?u=9248226"][IMG]http://jaliborc.com/images/external/patreon.png[/IMG][/URL] [URL="https://github.com/tullamods/Bagnon/issues"][IMG]http://jaliborc.com/images/external/github_issue.png[/IMG][/URL] [URL="https://github.com/tullamods/Wildpants/wiki"][IMG]http://jaliborc.com/images/external/github_wiki.png[/IMG][/URL]

[COLOR="Orange"][SIZE="3"]Overview[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Bagnon is a highly customizable bag replacement addon designed to help the player find items as quickly and as easily as possible. Beyond the basic all-bags-in-one functionality, Bagnon provides features such as:
[LIST]
[*]Ability to view the items of any character, from anywhere  [SIZE="1"][COLOR="silver"]*[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[*]Inventory, bank, vault and guild bank support
[*]Coloring based on item quality and more
[*]Intelligent item search engine
[*]Tooltip item counts
[*]Item rulesets
[*]Databroker support
[/LIST]
[SIZE="1"][I][COLOR="Silver"]* - Requires the player to login and visit the bank once at each character[/COLOR][/I][/SIZE]

[COLOR="Orange"][SIZE="3"]Plugins[/SIZE][/COLOR]
A wide assortment of plugins has been made by people in the community:
[LIST]
[*][URL="https://wow.curseforge.com/projects/bagnon-currencies"]Bagnon Currencies[/URL] - Allows you to track currencies on any window
[*][URL="https://wow.curseforge.com/projects/bagnon-scrap"]Bagnon Scrap[/URL] - Colors your Scrap on all windows
[*][URL="https://wow.curseforge.com/projects/bagnon-facade"]Bagnon Facade[/URL] - Allows windows to be skinned with Masque
[*][URL="https://github.com/tullamods/Wildpants/wiki/Plugins"]And many more...[/URL]
[/LIST]

[COLOR="Orange"][SIZE="3"]Notes[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*]Please submit bugs and feature requests at [URL="http://github.com/tullamods/Bagnon/issues"]GitHub[/URL].
[*]Are you a developer? Bagnon provides a [URL="https://github.com/tullamods/Wildpants/wiki"]rich API[/URL] for developing plugins and extra rulesets!
[*]Please consider supporting Bagnon by becoming a [URL="https://www.patreon.com/user?u=9248226"]patron [/URL]or submitting a [URL="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?hosted_button_id=JVA9GGJJ75K3J&item_name=Bagnon+(from+WoWInterface)&cmd=_s-xclick"]donation[/URL].
[*]Visit me at [URL="http://www.jaliborc.com/"]jaliborc.com[/URL].
[/LIST]

name: CritSound
description:
plays a sound when you perform a critical hit or healing.

includes your physical damage ,spell damage, ranged damage, healing and your damage shield.

CritSound includes three mode:

1.single mode: always plays the first sound in the list.

2.sequence mode: plays the sounds in the list one by one when you perform a critical hit continually.

3.random mode: plays the sounds in the list randomly.

Use /cs or /critsound to open the controlpanel.

if you use the sequence mode, you can modify the aging time for collecting your critical hits.

you can edit CritSound.lua to delete or add sounds.

for example, in the line 5 to 11:

spell = {

            "CriticalDamage.ogg",    --first time

            "Dominating.ogg",        --second time

            "Unstoppable.ogg",        --etc.

            "Wickedsick.ogg",

            "Godlike.ogg",

},

if you want to add xxx.ogg just add it below the last sound, but don't forget to add a comma after the new lines.

from WoD, you 'must' use ogg instead of mp3.

spell = {

            "CriticalDamage.ogg",    --first time

            "Dominating.ogg",        --second time

            "Unstoppable.ogg",        --etc.

            "Wickedsick.ogg",

            "Godlike.ogg",

"xxx.ogg",

},

name: DejaClassicStats (WOTLK)
description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5][B][COLOR=#00ccff][FONT=verdana][B]DejaClassicStats[/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]

[I][SIZE=5][FONT=verdana][B]Ready for [/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/I][I][SIZE=5][FONT=verdana][B][I][SIZE=5][FONT=verdana][B][COLOR=#6666ff]Wrath of the Lich King[/COLOR][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/I]![/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/I]
[/CENTER]

[CENTER][B][FONT=verdana][SIZE=4][URL="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a-bHbqYRHTQ"][COLOR=#faebd7][B]Watch the Video Overview[/B][/COLOR][/URL][/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/CENTER]

  [CENTER][FONT=verdana][B][URL="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=CL4UN8NCQLZQL&source=url"]DejaDonate[/URL][/B] - Support DejaClassicStats' continued development by [URL="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=CL4UN8NCQLZQL&source=url"]donating[/URL] to DCS![/FONT]
[/CENTER]

[CENTER][CENTER] [CENTER] [CENTER][SIZE=4][I][B]DejaDonate:[/B][/I][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=4] [URL="https://www.curseforge.com/linkout?remoteUrl=https%253a%252f%252fwww.paypal.com%252fdonate%253fhosted_button_id%253dCL4UN8NCQLZQL"] [IMG]https://i.imgur.com/OuqaxDD.png[/IMG][/URL] [URL="https://www.curseforge.com/linkout?remoteUrl=https%253a%252f%252fwww.paypal.com%252fdonate%253fhosted_button_id%253dCL4UN8NCQLZQL"][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/LhDP2Lo.png[/IMG][/URL][/SIZE] [/CENTER]
 [/CENTER]
 [/CENTER]
 [/CENTER]

   [CENTER]
[/CENTER]
 [SIZE=4] [FONT=verdana]DejaClassicStats provides an updated and logical display of the character stats.

[/FONT][/SIZE] [CENTER][SIZE=3][FONT=verdana][B]Features[/B][/FONT][/SIZE]
[/CENTER]
 [COLOR=#ffffff] [FONT=verdana][B]Options Overview:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][FONT=verdana]Display each equipped item's level, durability, and repair cost.[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]Display a quick graphical "Durability Bar" next to each equipped item.[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]Display total average durability of equipped gear on your character's shirt slot.[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]Display "General", "Primary", "Offense", "Defense", "Melee Enhancements", and "Spell Enhancements" stats.[/FONT][/LIST][B][FONT=verdana][B]
[COLOR=#ffffff]Default Display[/COLOR][/B][/FONT][/B][COLOR=#ffffff]

  [FONT=verdana][B]Primary:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][FONT=verdana]Strength[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]Agility[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]Stamina[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]Intellect[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]Spirit[/FONT][/LIST][COLOR=#ffffff] [FONT=verdana][B]General:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][COLOR=#ff0000][I][FONT=verdana]Health*[/FONT][/I][/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ff0000][I][FONT=verdana]Power(Mana, Energy, Rage)*[/FONT][/I][/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Movement Speed[/FONT]
[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Durability[/FONT]
[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Item Slot Durability Display[/FONT]
[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Repair Cost[/FONT]
[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Item Slot Repair Cost Display[/FONT][/COLOR][/LIST][COLOR=#ffffff] [FONT=verdana][B]Offense:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][FONT=verdana]Damage[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]Attack Power[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]Attack Speed[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]Weapon DPS[/FONT][/LIST][COLOR=#ffffff] [FONT=verdana][B]Defense:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Resistances(Arcane, Fire, Nature, Frost,Shadow)
[/FONT][/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Armor[/FONT]
[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Dodge[/FONT][/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Parry[/FONT][/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Block[/FONT]
[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Defense[/FONT][/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ff0000][I][FONT=verdana]Crushing*[/FONT][/I][/COLOR][/LIST][COLOR=#ffffff] [B][FONT=verdana]Melee Enhancements:[/FONT][/B][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*]Melee Hit
[*]Melee +Damage
[*]Melee Critical Strike
[*]Ranged Critical Strike[/LIST][COLOR=#ffffff] [B][FONT=verdana]Spell Enhancements:[/FONT][/B][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*]Spell Hit
[*]Spell+Damage
[*]Spell Critical Strike
[*]+Healing
[*]MP5 (Soon™)
[*]Mana Regen Not Casting
[*]Mana Regen Casting[/LIST]  [COLOR=#ff0000][I][FONT=verdana][B]Skills(Including XP bar):*[/B][/FONT][/I][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][COLOR=#ff0000][I][FONT=verdana]Weapon Skills(Only skills you've learned)*[/FONT][/I][/COLOR][/LIST]  [COLOR=#ff0000][I][FONT=verdana][B]Professions(Including XP bar):*[/B][/FONT][/I][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][COLOR=#ff0000][I][FONT=verdana]Both primaries*[/FONT][/I][/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#ff0000][I][FONT=verdana]Secondaries(Cooking, First Aid)*[/FONT][/I][/COLOR][/LIST]  [COLOR=#ff0000][I][FONT=verdana][B]Reputations(Including XP bar):*[/B][/FONT][/I][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][COLOR=#ff0000][I][FONT=verdana]Only Reputations you've established(Tracked always at top)*[/FONT][/I][/COLOR][/LIST][COLOR=#ffffff] [B][FONT=verdana][B]Item Level:[/B][/FONT][/B][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana]Item Slot Item Level Display[/FONT][/COLOR][/LIST] 
[COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana][B]Installation and Use of DejaClassicStats[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#ffffff] [FONT=verdana][B]Installation:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][FONT=verdana]Install to your "AddOns" folder (World of Warcraft\Interface\AddOns) and login to WoW.[/FONT][/LIST][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana] [B]Interface Options Settings[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ffffff]  [FONT=verdana][B]Item Slots:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][FONT=verdana][COLOR=#ffffff][B]Item Level:[/B][/COLOR] Displays the item level of each equipped item.[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana][COLOR=#ffffff][B]Durability Bars:[/B][/COLOR] Displays a durability bar next to each item with less than 100% durability for a quick visual reference.[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana][COLOR=#ffffff][B]Average Durability:[/B][/COLOR] Displays on the character shirt slot the total average durability of all equipped gear.[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana][COLOR=#ffffff][B]Item Durability:[/B][/COLOR] Displays a durability overlay on each equipped item's slot.[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana][COLOR=#ffffff][B]Item Repair Cost:[/B][/COLOR] Displays an overlay of the Repair Total on each equipped item's slot.[/FONT][/LIST]
  [IMG]https://cdn-wow.mmoui.com/preview/pvw71788.png[/IMG]
[COLOR=#ffffff]  [FONT=verdana][B]Slash Commands:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][FONT=verdana]/dcstats: Displays the DejaClassicStats version and slash commands.[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]/dcstats config: Opens the DejaClassicStats addon config menu.[/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana]/dcstats reset: Resets DejaClassicStats options to default. 
[/FONT][/LIST][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana][B]Known Issues:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][FONT=verdana]Repair costs doesn't show on login but shows otherwise on UI reload.[/FONT][/LIST][COLOR=#ffffff] [FONT=verdana][B]TODO:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][FONT=verdana]Too much to list. This is a WIP. This will be updated as we remember and come across more stats we want to track.[/FONT][/LIST][COLOR=#ffffff] [FONT=verdana][B]Future Possibilities:[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[LIST]
[*][FONT=verdana]Tons! Send us suggestions [URL="https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dejacharacterstats/issues"]here[/URL].[/FONT][/LIST] 
[FONT=verdana]Found an error or bug? Reporting them by making a ticket [URL="https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dejaclassicstats/issues"]here[/URL] after following [URL="https://phanx.net/addons/help"]these[/URL] steps makes fixing errors faster. Thanks!
[/FONT]
 [COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=verdana][B]We would like to thank everyone that helped make DCS possible.[/B][/FONT][/COLOR]

 [FONT=verdana][B][COLOR=#00ccff]Contributors:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ffffff]Dejoblue, Kakjens, loudsoul[/COLOR][/B][/FONT]
 [FONT=verdana][B][COLOR=#00ccff]Localization Translators:[/COLOR][/B][/FONT]
[LIST]
[*][FONT=verdana][B][COLOR=#00ccff]French:[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffffff] Medaleux, sv002, Darkcraft92, Ymvej, Druidzor, napnapnapnapnap[/COLOR][/B][/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana][B][COLOR=#00ccff]German:[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffffff]pas06, flow0284, Markurion, Branduril, NekoNyaaaa[/COLOR][/B][/FONT]

[*][FONT=verdana][B][COLOR=#00ccff]Spanish:[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffffff]Tholagar, Mikel391, MrUrkaz, Krounted, Valhallanem[/COLOR][/B][/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana][B][COLOR=#00ccff]Italian:[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffffff]infinitybofh, INoobInside[/COLOR][COLOR=#00ccff][COLOR=#000000]
[/COLOR][/COLOR][/B][/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana][B][COLOR=#00ccff]Korean:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ffffff]PositiveMind, yuk6196, netaras, meloppy, next96[/COLOR][/B][/FONT]
[*][FONT=verdana][B][COLOR=#00ccff]Russian:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#ffffff]Nappsel, Wishko, berufegoru, Hubbotu, n1mrorox[/COLOR][/B][/FONT]

 [FONT=verdana][B][COLOR=#00ccff]Individuals: [/COLOR][/B][COLOR=#ffffff][B]Baudzila, 10leej, wizardanim, Phanx, Ro, Choonster, Zork, Lombra, myrroddin, Darth_Predator, sirann, and YOU[/B][/COLOR]

name: Details! Damage Meter Classic
description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WjbOXzt.png[/IMG]

[SIZE="2"][COLOR="DimGray"]Join Details! Discord Server![/COLOR][/SIZE]
[URL="https://discord.gg/AGSzAZX"][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/G7EOxDw.png[/IMG][/URL]

Hello!
Raider or pvp player, doesn't matter, we are always searching for more Intel, ways to make deep analysis, methods to know everything what's going on around us. From casual to theory crafter, knowledge is essential for growing as a player.
If you fit in this profile, if you want to know from a simple "how much damage I'm doing" to more complex "how many times a healer casted that cooldown on the main tank", Details! is an addon for you!

One of our goal is making the interface clean, easy to use and dynamic, this is a list of smart shortcuts you may see as useful:
[LIST]
[*][B]left click[/B]: open the details window for a player, or, open the report window depending on what's being shown in the window.
[*][B]shift + left click[/B]: depending on what displays you are, it may report only that line or open more details from the actor or spell shown on the bar.
[*][B]right click[/B]: if clicked at the title bar: open a panel showing all displays available, if clicked at any other point in the window: open the bookmark panel, you can add/remove/select your favorites displays from there for fast switch between them.
[/LIST]

[COLOR="Orange"]Important[/COLOR]: Details! is in constantly update, if you install and feel like this addon isn't for you, please leave a comment telling which part of the addon made you give up from it. Negative feedbacks are important as positive ones, we are always seeking ways on how to improve it, thank you!

[LIST]
[*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/w0tOB90.png[/IMG] [B]main menu[/B]: select the mode to use, [B]Everything[/B]: shows everything, [B]Standard[/B]: show only raid or party members, [B]Plugins[/B]: may select between raid and solo plugins. [B]Window Control[/B]: open, reopen or close the window, you may also close with the shortcut [B]ctrl + right click[/B].
[*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EdcdlZR.png[/IMG] [B]segments menu[/B]: select between overall data, current and other past fights. you may also use [B]shift + right click[/B] if you feel that it's better.
[*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S96r9So.png[/IMG] [B]display menu[/B]: select the display, e.g., healing done, damage, cooldowns, etc.
[*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ihesyM9.png[/IMG] [B]report button[/B]: click to report.
[*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uJoxLuW.png[/IMG] [B]reset button[/B]: clears all data.
[/LIST]

[URL="http://www.wowinterface.com/portal.php?&uid=320162"][COLOR="silver"]Seeking a change-log list? check out here our blog[/COLOR] [/URL]
[URL="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5tIOSJx1pPo"][COLOR="silver"]Youtube: Details! Features.[/COLOR][/URL]
[URL="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vE46TaGN4JU"][COLOR="silver"]Youtube: Details! Speed of Raid update rate.[/COLOR][/URL]


[B][SIZE="4"]Features:[/SIZE][/B]
[LIST]
Some features which you will find in Details!:
[*]native multi window support, you can open and close them on-the-fly, also has support for key binds.
[*]reads all combat log data, store and display it to you in rectangular bars very well made and shaped.
[*]has a fast engine for data capture not hurting your frame rate, specially during heroism/bloodlust.
[*]support custom displays where you can create your own display, or, import one from others.
[*]beautiful design.
[*]dynamic overall data, you may only reset the overall or set rules for auto reset on new bosses or instance.
[*]love nature and the animals.
[*]tons of plugins, e.g. threat meter, encounter analysis, tank debuffs, etc.
[*]can measure dps/hps using encounter time like warcraft logs or individual player active time.
[*]easy to use displays with bookmark on right click, full info with a simple mouse hover over a bar.
[*]chuck norris approves Details!, he also use it to calculate the strength of big bang when he created the universe.
[*]graphics for raid damage done, boss emotes tracker, aura creator tool for weakauras.
[*]has support for skins, also is compatible with ElvUI and other similar Interfaces.
[/LIST]
[B][SIZE="4"]Plugins[/SIZE][/B]
These are some of the plugins:
[LIST]
[*][B]Dps Tuning[/B]: check your damage seeing the spell values and graphics.
[*][B]Encounter Details[/B]: a raid encounter tool, shows dps graphics, summary of dispells, interrupts, deaths, emotes, aura tools, and more...
[*][B]Raid Check[/B]: show food, flask, runes, item level status of raid members.
[*][B]Time Attack[/B]: test dps on dummies with fixed time lengths, also stores your attempts for later comparisons.
[*][B]TinyThreat[/B]: a small, but powerful, threat meter.
[*][B]Vanguard[/B]: show debuff timers on tanks.
[/LIST]
[LIST]
[*] [URL="http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/details-chart-viewer-plugin"]Chart Viewer[/URL]: create and view charts ingame.
[*] [URL="http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/details_timeline"]Time Line[/URL]: see the cooldown usage and debuff taken in time-line fashion.
[*] [URL="http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/details-advanced-death-logs-plug"]Advanced Death Logs[/URL]: see where raid members are failing and who is dying more.
[/LIST]

[B][SIZE="4"]History[/SIZE][/B]
In early 2013, Details! had the first lines of code written, in the beggining was just dust and a goal of an addon which could capture the damage increase of trinkets 'procs'.

After two weeks a lamp turns on over the code writer head and a new ideia comes: 'if i can capture my damage, why not capture everybody damage?', and from this point Details! become a long journey to become what he is today.

First alpha version has been published in early august 2013.
In March 2014 began the beta period listening the feedback of users on mmo-champion forum.

Now we have a solid release and new stuff are added every week.


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7O1f4oN.png[/IMG]

name: Fizzle
description:
[U][B]Fizzle[/B][/U]

[I]Description[/I]
Fizzle is an addon that will show you an items durability values above the item in your character frame.
It can show you either the raw values, or a percentage value.
Why Fizzle?  Well, I suck at coming up with names is why. :)

[I]Slash Commands[/I]
[I]/fizzle[/I] or [I]/fizz[/I]
[list][*]percent - Toggle between raw and percentage display.
[*]border - Toggles the quality colours on the border of items.
[*]invert - Changes how the durability is shown.  Eg. 0% = Max durability, 100% = No durability.
[*]hidetext - Hides the durability text, incase you just want the item quality colouring.
[*]showfull - Toggles showing durability when full.  If enabled, durability text is always shown, if disabled, durability text is only shown if durability is less than 100%
[*]inspect - Toggles the inspection module.[/list]

name: Mapster
description:
Mapster is a very simple world map enhacement addon, which was designed to work in conjunction with all other map addons out there. The idea to create Mapster originated from pure lack of a simplistic addon that only modifies the world map, without adding a full scale feature set.

[B]Features[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Map Style (Scale & Alpha)
[*]Coordinates
[*]Fog of War removal
[*]Enhancement of the raid/party group icons
[/LIST]

You can access the Mapster configuration menu through the new button on the world map, as shown in the screenshot. 
All features (except the style) can be turned off individually if you do not need/want them.

[I]If you're looking for a replacement to Cartographer, i also recommend the following addons:[/I][LIST][*][B]Gathering[/B] -> GatherMate (Hosted on WoWAce -> [URL="http://www.wowace.com/projects/gather-mate/"]Download[/URL]) 
[*][B]Waypoints[/B] -> [URL="http://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info7032-TomTom.html"]TomTom[/URL]
[*][B]ZoneInfo[/B] -> [URL="http://mods.curse.com/addons/wow/cromulent"]Cromulent[/URL]
[*][B]Notes[/B] -> [URL="http://mods.curse.com/addons/wow/handynotes"]HandyNotes[/URL] | [URL="http://mods.curse.com/search?search=handynotes"]HandyNotes Modules[/URL]
[/LIST]

name: Quartz - Modular Casting Bar
description:
Quartz is a modular approach to a casting bar addon.  An overview of (hopefully most of) the modules:

[b]*Player[/b]
The core of Quartz is lightweight implementation of a standard casting bar, with configurable size, text and icon positioning, and colors.
[b]*Target/Focus[/b]
Implementation of target and focus casting bars in similar fashion to the player cast bar.
[b]*Buffs[/b]
Display of target and focus buffs and debuffs as duration bars using the new API introduced in patch 2.1.
[b]*Flight[/b]
Hooks into FlightMap or InFlight to display the current flight progress on your casting bar.
[b]*Global Cooldown[/b]
Displays a tiny spark-bar to show your Global Cooldown near the cast bar.  Helpful for those who'd rather not squint at their action bars to see when they can cast again.
[b]*Interrupt[/b]
Changes the color and text of your casting bar to help show that your cast has been interrupted (and show who interrupted it).
[b]*Latency[/b]
Displays the amount of time spent between cast send and start events, in the form of a bar at the end of your casting bar, with optional text that displays the actual duration of the lag.  This helps in canceling casts when they will not actually be interrupted, especially for users with consistently high pings.
[b]*Mirror[/b]
Shows the 'basic' timers such as breath and feign death, as well as some 'odd' ones such as party invite time, resurrect timeout, and arena game start, and a framework for injecting custom timers into the bars.
[b]*Range[/b]
Recolors the casting bar when your cast target moves out of range mid-cast.
[b]*Swing[/b]
Displays a swing timer for your melee weapon as well as hunter autoshot.
[b]*Timer[/b]
Allows for creating custom timers displayed on the mirror bars.
[b]*Tradeskill Merge[/b]
Merges multiple casts of the same tradeskill item into one big cast bar.


Use /quartz to bring up the configuration menu.

name: TinyTooltip
description:
-------------------------------------------------
[CENTER][/CENTER][SIZE="6"][COLOR="Magenta"]A powerful tooltip![/COLOR][/SIZE]
-------------------------------------------------

use [COLOR="Lime"]/tinytooltip[/COLOR] or [COLOR="Lime"]/tip[/COLOR] for configuration
You can drag each element after clicking DIY.
You can also configure the appearance of any one of the tooltip addon.

name: Titan Panel Classic
description:
[SIZE="4"][COLOR="Red"]NOTE[/COLOR] : This version is for WoW Classic ONLY.[/SIZE]

[SIZE="4"][COLOR="Orange"]About[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE="2"]Titan Panel Classic adds one or two information bars on the top and/or bottom of the screen and allows a framework for extensive plugin support.
Details about the Titan Panel Development Team can be found at the [URL="http://www.titanpanel.org/about.html"]About[/URL] subpage at their portal site.[/SIZE]

[SIZE="4"][COLOR="Orange"]Features[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[LIST]
[*]The ability to have 1 or 2 bars at the top and/or the bottom of your screen. 
[*]Many builtin plugins that provide a great core set of features. 
[*]Easy to use menus and options to change features on the fly. 
[*]Fully supported plugin system. All plugins on the bar are plug-n-play.
[*]Ability to utilize [URL="http://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/index.php?cid=108"]Data Broker[/URL] plugins.
[/LIST]

[SIZE="4"][COLOR="Orange"]Bug Reports[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE="2"]Direct all issues and feature requests to the [URL="https://sourceforge.net/p/titan-panel-classic/tickets/"]SourceForge[/URL] Titan Panel Development Team page.[/SIZE]

[SIZE="4"][COLOR="Orange"]Special Instructions[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[LIST=1]
[*]Please read the included [URL="http://www.titanpanel.org/TitanPanelSetup-READ_ME_FIRST.txt"]TitanPanelSetup-READ_ME_FIRST.txt[/URL] file for any special instructions needed to use this version of Titan Panel.
[/LIST]

[SIZE="4"][COLOR="Orange"]Problem Escalation[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[LIST=1]
[*]Please check the [URL="http://www.titanpanel.org/"]Titan Panel Portal[/URL] for a list of recent issues. These will appear on the main page.
[*]If you are still having issues, please follow the instructions under [I]Bug Reports[/I] above.
[/LIST]

[SIZE="4"][COLOR="Orange"]Included[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[B][I]Core[/I][/B]:
[LIST]
[*]TitanAutoHide & TitanAuxAutoHide
[*]TitanPanel & supporting modules
[/LIST]
[B][I]Embedded[/I][/B]:
[LIST]
[*]Ace3
[*]LibSharedMedia-3.0
[*]LibQTip-1.0
[*]LibUIDropDownMenu
[/LIST]
[B][I]BuiltIns[/I][/B]:
[LIST]
[*]TitanClassicAmmo
[*]TitanClassicBag
[*]TitanClassicClock
[*]TitanClassicGold
[*]TitanClassicLocation
[*]TitanClassicLootType
[*]TitanClassicPerformance
[*]TitanClassicRegen
[*]TitanClassicRepair
[*]TitanClassicVolume
[*]TitanClassicXP
[/LIST]

[SIZE="4"][COLOR="Orange"]History[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE="2"]The codebase for Titan Panel Classic was transferred from the original Titan Panel code.  A few very dedicated people have maintained Titan Panel over the years. They are in order of chronological responsibility: TitanMod, Dark Imakuni and Adsertor.[/SIZE]

name: TradeSkillMaster
description:
TradeSkillMaster (TSM) is an addon designed to help both casual gold makers as well as experienced goblins streamline their gold-making processes. TSM's features include everything from improving the native crafting and auctioning experiences to helping you gather needed materials and sniping that low-hanging auction house fruit!

TradeSkillMaster offers the following features:

[LIST]
[*]The TSM Core window is your new home-base! Here you'll be able to create your all-important groups and operations, that will help you manage your targeted markets and lead you to success on the auction house. Not a fan of creating your own groups? You can easily import groups from the new and improved import/export tab. Lastly, manage your sales & expense data and track your incoming gold with the Ledger tab.
[*]TSM's Crafting window allows you analyze what crafts will sell profitably and allows you to build a queue, speeding up the crafting process dramatically. It also includes the powerful Gathering function that will help guide you toward easily acquiring any needed materials.
[*]Tasklist: The new tasklist feature helps with gathering and cooldown management; automatically alerting you about available craft-able cooldowns or materials needed.
[*]The Destroying window helps efficiently mill, prospect, and disenchants items at super speed!
[*]TSM's Mailing window allows you to quickly and easily empty your mailbox as well as automatically send items to other characters with the single click of a button.
[*]Vendoring gives you an enhanced interface for buying from a vendor, and selling items from your bags to the vendor.
[*]The BankUI helps manage your inventory by allowing you to easily move predefined groups of items between your bags, bank, and guild bank.
[/LIST]
Whether you're a new user or long time TSM veteran, please check out our website for more information and premium features related to TSM: https://www.tradeskillmaster.com/

name: Trinket Menu Classic
description:
Trinket Menu addon updated for Classic 

Not extensively tested (as I don't have trinkets yet :>) so ymmv. Please let me know of any errors

name: WIM (WoW Instant Messenger)
description:
WIM (WoW Instant Messenger) is a World of Warcraft addon which helps you to manage your whispers by making them into a classic instant messenger interface such as AIM, Yahoo and MSN. 

With game play in mind, WIM has a large array of options where you can customize how WIM interacts during different situations, such as while you are in combat or in town talking to friends or selling your crafts.

[B]Some of WIM's major features are:[/B]
-Tabbed or windowed messages
-History
-Filtering
-Fully customizable
-and more...

To keep up to date with WIM and its developement, be sure to visit [URL]http://www.wimaddon.com[/URL]. WIMAddon.com is a great place to converse with the developers and users of WIM.


*I welcome all comments and suggestions. It is the wow community which helps in creating a success.

**Special thanks to everyone who has helped me test this addon.
